comments:
i have Eclipse 3.3M6 with: EMF, Batik, EMF frameworks, GEF, OCL, UML2 from Europa Update Site.

Now i am trying to install GMF, but get following error, while downloading it. Log entries are attached below.
Server returns "404" for org.eclipse.gmf.sdk_1.0.0.v20070403-1500.jar.
Is it expected behaviour?
I've tried following mirrors, but everytime the same result:
a) Europa Discovery site
b) [Germany] Innoopract Informationssysteme GmbH (http)

Not only i have this problem, but it was confirmed also by others on eclipse.modeling.gmf and looks like it's mentioned in this bug:
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=183434

Steps to reproduce:
1. click "Help -> Software Updates -> Find and install..."
2. click "Search for new features to install"
3. choose Europa Discovery site and press "Finish"
4. choose mirror
5. in "Select the features to install" choose "Europa Discovery Site -> Models and Model Development -> Graphical Modeling Framework (Europa Edition) 2.0.0.v20070330-130-..." and press "Next", "Next", "Finish"
6. while downloading, error message appears: "Update operation has failed" and terminates update.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.update.core 4 0 2007-05-06 22:37:19.284
!MESSAGE Error retrieving "plugins/org.eclipse.gmf.sdk_1.0.0.v20070403-1500.jar". [Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://download.eclipse.org/releases/europa/plugins/org.eclipse.gmf.sdk_1.0.0.v20070403-1500.jar.]
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FatalIOException: Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://download.eclipse.org/releases/europa/plugins/org.eclipse.gmf.sdk_1.0.0.v20070403-1500.jar.
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.UpdateManagerUtils.checkConnectionResult(UpdateManagerUtils.java:561)
    at org.eclipse.update.core.ContentReference.getInputSize(ContentReference.java:196)
    at org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureContentProvider.asLocalReference(FeatureContentProvider.java:228)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.retrieveLocalJar(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:232)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.getPluginEntryArchiveReferences(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:179)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.operations.UpdateUtils.downloadFeatureContent(UpdateUtils.java:628)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.download(InstallWizard2.java:426)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.access$3(InstallWizard2.java:397)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2$3.run(InstallWizard2.java:350)
    at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 8 1 2007-05-06 22:37:24.391
!MESSAGE
seems it's working back now, GMF is downloadable through Europa update site.

traces.message: Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://download.eclipse.org/releases/europa/plugins/org.eclipse.gmf.sdk_1.0.0.v20070403-1500.jar.
